title: Varane Avashyamund
short_cast: Shobana, Urvashi, Lal Jose, Suresh Gopi, Dulquer Salmaan, Kalyani Priyadarshan, Lalu Alex, Sarvajith Santosh Sivan, Johny Antony, K.P.A.C. Lalitha

desc: At an apartment complex, the lives of a mother, a daughter seeking an arranged marriage, a military retiree and a young man become intertwined.
